common.errorGeneric: Sorry, I didn't catch that. Could you say it again, please?

feed.adSkipped: Ad skipped. No reward was earned.

profile.friendsListPrivate: This user's friends list is private.

settings.title: Settings
settings.postVisibility: Who can see your future posts?
settings.friendRequestPrivacy: Who can send you friend requests?
settings.friendListVisibility: Who can see your friends list?
settings.blockingDescription: Once you block someone, that person can no longer see things you post on your timeline, tag you, invite you to events or groups, start a conversation with you, or add you as a friend. Say "block [name]" on their profile.
settings.deactivateConfirmBody: This will log you out immediately. You can reactivate your account at any time by simply logging back in.

friends.title: Friends
friends.noUsersToShow: No users to show in this list.

conversations.title: Messages
conversations.noMessagesDescription: When you start a new conversation, it will appear here.

tts.welcome: Welcome to VoiceBook. Say 'log in' or 'sign up', or use the mic.
tts.signup_fullname: Let's create an account. First, please say your full name.
tts.signup_username: Great. Now, say a unique username. It cannot have spaces.
tts.signup_username_invalid: That username is invalid or already taken. Please say a different one.
tts.signup_password: Now say a secure password. I will not display it.
tts.signup_password_mismatch: Passwords do not match. Say the password again.
tts.signup_code_sent: A verification code has been sent to your email. Please say the code.
tts.signup_invalid_code: That code is incorrect. A new code has been sent. Please try again.
tts.login_prompt: Say your username or email. For testing, you can also say 'Shojib Khan'.
tts.login_fail: Sorry, I couldn't log you in. Please check your details and try again.
tts.record_start: Recording will start after the beep. Say 'stop' to finish.
tts.record_stopped: You recorded {{duration}} seconds. Say 'post' to publish or 're-record' to redo.
tts.create_post_prompt: Compose your post. You can record audio, generate an image for {{cost}} coins, or both.
tts.comment_record_start: Record your comment after the beep. Say 'stop' to finish.
tts.comment_stopped: Comment recorded for {{duration}} seconds. Say 'post comment' to publish or 're-record' to redo.
tts.comment_suspended: Your commenting privileges have been temporarily suspended.
tts.error_generic: Sorry, I didn't catch that. Could you say it again, please?
tts.error_mic_permission: Microphone access denied. Please enable it in browser settings.
tts.error_mic_not_found: Microphone not found. Please ensure it's connected and enabled.
tts.error_no_speech_rec: Speech recognition is not supported in your browser.
tts.help: You can say commands like 'next post', 'record a new voice', or 'search for a friend'.
tts.profile_loaded: Viewing {{name}}'s profile. Say 'add friend', 'send message', or 'go back'.
tts.profile_loaded_own: Viewing your profile. Say 'edit profile' or scroll through your posts.
tts.friend_request_privacy_block: Sorry, {{name}} is not accepting friend requests right now.
tts.friend_requests_loaded: Viewing friend requests. Say 'accept' or 'decline' followed by the name.
tts.no_friend_requests: You have no new friend requests.
tts.friends_loaded: Viewing your friends. You can view requests, suggestions, or all friends.
tts.post_details_loaded: Showing post details. You can listen to comments or record your own.
tts.conversations_loaded: Here are your conversations. Say the name of the person you want to chat with.
tts.message_screen_loaded: Chatting with {{name}}. Type or record a message.
tts.message_record_start: Recording message. Say 'stop' when you are done.
tts.message_record_stopped: Recorded for {{duration}} seconds. Say 'send message' or 're-record'.
tts.settings_opened: Opening settings. You can say 'change work to...', 'set post visibility to friends', or 'save settings'.
tts.privacy_setting_updated: {{setting}} has been set to {{value}}. Say 'save settings' to confirm.
tts.notification_setting_updated: Notifications for {{setting}} turned {{value}}. Say "save settings" to confirm.
tts.user_blocked: You have blocked {{name}}. They will not be able to see your posts or interact with you.
tts.search_results_loaded: Found {{count}} results. Say 'select' and a number to view a profile.
tts.reward_claim_success: Success! {{coins}} Voice Coins have been added to your wallet.
tts.image_generation_insufficient_coins: You need {{cost}} Voice Coins to generate an image, but you only have {{balance}}. Watch an ad to earn more.
tts.image_generation_success_with_coins: Transaction successful! {{cost}} Voice Coins deducted. Generating image...
tts.password_changed_success: Your password has been successfully changed.
tts.password_change_fail: Failed to change password. Please check your current password.
tts.password_change_prompt: Please provide your current and new passwords.
tts.account_deactivated: Your account has been deactivated. You have been logged out.
tts.photo_update_fail: Sorry, the photo could not be uploaded. Please try again.
tts.groups_loaded: Here are the groups. You can join a group, create one, or view a group's page.
tts.group_page_loaded: Viewing the {{name}} group. You can post, view posts, or leave the group.
tts.join_request_sent: Your request to join the group has been sent.
tts.post_pending_approval: Your post has been submitted for admin approval.
tts.member_removed: {{name}} has been removed from the group.
tts.post_approved: Post approved and is now live in the group.
tts.post_pinned: Post pinned to the top of the group.
tts.rsvp_success: You are now attending the event.
tts.lead_form_opened: Please confirm your details to connect with the sponsor.
tts.lead_form_submitted: Thank you! Your information has been sent.
tts.lead_form_error: Sorry, there was an error submitting your information.
tts.friend_removed: {{name}} has been removed from your friends.
tts.request_cancelled: Friend request to {{name}} has been cancelled.
